title: 07/19/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/19/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend in sports. Who needs to step up for the Suns to win this series? How does Collin Morikawa stack up against some of sports other up and coming stars? Mike Florio calls in to update us on Aaron Rodgers and Deshaun Watson. And Reggie Miller relives his only NBA Finals appearance with us.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
